ai-atk-s0402a13:1_1: Fourth: the fourth, and the support of the state of existence and the defining of the Dhamma. It is peaceful and sublime in mind,
ai-atk-s0402a13:2_1: In the third tetrad the teaching.
ai-atk-s0402a13:2_2: In the fourth part of which is the same as “shop”.
ai-atk-s0402a13:3_1: In these five ways in material things are inferior to the one of the Dhamma, making the following exposition of the teaching, and in the end of the teaching.
ai-atk-s0402a13:4_0: I worship the sixth offerings of food.
ai-atk-s0402a13:5_0: Seven conjoins: these sets out for newly arrived monks.
ai-atk-s0402a13:6_1: These eight bases of psychic power are found in the Dhamma partaking of the Vinaya, as well as the proposal of the Dhamma.
ai-atk-s0402a13:10_1: Eleventh in material things increase in the teaching.

ai-atk-s0402a13:12_0: The fourth sub-chapter on hides is finished.
